SEARCH
Package Server.Model.Player

Class PersonalGoal

java.lang.Object
Server.Model.Player.PersonalGoal
public class PersonalGoal extends Object
The PersonalGoal class represents the personal goal of a player in the game. It contains information about the specific color tiles that the player needs to place on their shelf to achieve a higher score.
